'''Yellow Obsidian Ring''' is an [[Adventure Item]], crafted with {{Item|Yellow Obsidian Fragment|x=3}}. Once obtained, it allows the player to access the [[Tribal Secret Space]] of the [["Children of Echoes"]].

==Usage Location==
<gallery>
Tribal Secret Space "Children of Echoes" Location.png|Tribal Secret Space in [["Children of Echoes"]], [[Tequemecan Valley]]
Tribal Secret Space "Children of Echoes" Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
